This app requires the permission to mock location. Please enable mock location on Developer Options by going to Settings > Developer Options > Select mock location app.
This app uses the GPS to mock your location. Your GPS is turned off please turn it on.
Hint: How to use the map.
Select your desired location to mock on the map by pressing and holding it until a pop-up confirming your selection appears.
